FluentGrid.Padding: Gets or sets the component [CSS padding](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/CSS/padding) property.
FluentGrid.Spacing: Gets or sets the distance between flexbox items, using a multiple of 4px.Only values from 0 to 10 are possible.
FluentGrid.Style: Gets or sets the in-line styles. If given, these will be included in the style attribute of the component.

FluentGridItem.__summary__: Value placed within a `FluentGrid` layout using the `FluentGridItem` component.
FluentGridItem.AdaptiveRendering: Gets or sets the adaptive rendering, which not render the HTML code when the item is hidden (true) or only hide the item by CSS (false).Default is false.
FluentGridItem.ChildContent: Gets or sets the content to be rendered inside the component.
FluentGridItem.Class: Gets or sets the CSS class names. If given, these will be included in the class attribute of the component.
FluentGridItem.Data: Gets or sets custom data, to attach any user data object to the component.
FluentGridItem.Gap: Gets or sets the gaps (gutters) between rows and columns.See https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/gap
FluentGridItem.HiddenWhen: Hide the item on the specified sizes (you can combine multiple values: GridItemHidden.Sm | GridItemHidden.Xl).
FluentGridItem.Id: Gets or sets the unique identifier.The value will be used as the HTML [global id attribute](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/HTML/Global_attributes/id).
FluentGridItem.Justify: Defines how the browser distributes space between and around content items.
FluentGridItem.Lg: The number of columns the item should span in the 12-column grid system.Large (lg) devices (desktops, less than 1920px wide)
FluentGridItem.Margin: Gets or sets the component [CSS margin](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/CSS/margin) property.
FluentGridItem.Md: The number of columns the item should span in the 12-column grid system.Medium (md) devices (tablets, less than 1280px wide)
FluentGridItem.Padding: Gets or sets the component [CSS padding](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/CSS/padding) property.
FluentGridItem.Sm: The number of columns the item should span in the 12-column grid system.Small (sm) devices (landscape phones, less than 960px wide)
FluentGridItem.Style: Gets or sets the in-line styles. If given, these will be included in the style attribute of the component.
FluentGridItem.Xl: The number of columns the item should span in the 12-column grid system.Extra large (xl) devices (large desktops, less than 2560px wide)
FluentGridItem.Xs: The number of columns the item should span in the 12-column grid system.Extra Small (xs) devices (portrait phones, less than 600px wide)
FluentGridItem.Xxl: The number of columns the item should span in the 12-column grid system.Extra extra large (xxl) devices (larger desktops, more than 2560px wide)

FluentHighlighter.__summary__: A component which highlights words or phrases within text.
FluentHighlighter.CaseSensitive: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the highlighted text is case sensitive.
FluentHighlighter.Class: Gets or sets the CSS class names. If given, these will be included in the class attribute of the component.
FluentHighlighter.Data: Gets or sets custom data, to attach any user data object to the component.
FluentHighlighter.Delimiters: Gets or sets the list of delimiters chars. Example: " ,;".
FluentHighlighter.HighlightedText: Gets or sets the fragment of text to be highlighted.
FluentHighlighter.Id: Gets or sets the unique identifier.The value will be used as the HTML [global id attribute](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/HTML/Global_attributes/id).
FluentHighlighter.Margin: Gets or sets the component [CSS margin](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/CSS/margin) property.
FluentHighlighter.Padding: Gets or sets the component [CSS padding](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/CSS/padding) property.
FluentHighlighter.Style: Gets or sets the in-line styles. If given, these will be included in the style attribute of the component.
FluentHighlighter.Text: Gets or sets the whole text in which a fragment will be highlighted.
FluentHighlighter.UntilNextBoundary: If true, highlights the text until the next regex boundary.

FluentIcon`1.__summary__: FluentIcon is a component that renders an icon from the Fluent System icon set.
FluentIcon`1.Class: Gets or sets the CSS class names. If given, these will be included in the class attribute of the component.
FluentIcon`1.Color: Gets or sets the icon drawing and fill color. Value comes from the `Color` enumeration. Defaults to Accent.
FluentIcon`1.CustomColor: Gets or sets the icon drawing and fill color to a custom value.Needs to be formatted as an HTML hex color string (#RRGGBB or #RGB) or CSS variable.⚠️ Only available when Color is set to Color.Custom.
FluentIcon`1.Data: Gets or sets custom data, to attach any user data object to the component.
FluentIcon`1.Focusable: Gets or sets whether the icon is focusable (adding tab-index="0" and role="button"),allows the icon to be focused sequentially (generally with the Tab key).
FluentIcon`1.Id: Gets or sets the unique identifier.The value will be used as the HTML [global id attribute](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/HTML/Global_attributes/id).
FluentIcon`1.Margin: Gets or sets the component [CSS margin](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/CSS/margin) property.
FluentIcon`1.OnClick: Allows for capturing a mouse click on an icon.
FluentIcon`1.Padding: Gets or sets the component [CSS padding](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/CSS/padding) property.
FluentIcon`1.Slot: Gets or sets the slot where the icon is displayed in.
FluentIcon`1.Style: Gets or sets the in-line styles. If given, these will be included in the style attribute of the component.
FluentIcon`1.Title: Gets or sets the title for the icon.
FluentIcon`1.Tooltip: Gets or sets the tooltip text (supports HTML tags).This parameter requires the presence of a 'FluentTooltipProvider' in your main/layout page. _This parameter cannot be updated after the component has been rendered._
FluentIcon`1.Value: Gets or sets the Icon object to render.
FluentIcon`1.Width: Gets or sets the icon width.If not set, the icon size will be used.

Icon.Content: Gets the content of the icon: SVG path.
Icon.FromImageUrl(String): Returns an icon from an image source.
Icon.Name: Gets the name of the icon: AddCircle, Accessibility, etc.
Icon.Size: Gets the size of the icon: 20, 24, etc.
Icon.ToDataUri(String, String): Gets the data URI of the icon.
Icon.ToMarkup(String, String, String, String,: Gets the HTML markup of the icon.
Icon.Variant: Gets the variant of the icon: Filled, Regular.
Icon.WithColor(String): Sets the color of the icon.
Icon.WithColor(Color): Sets the color of the icon.

IconInfo.Name: Gets the name of the icon: AddCircle, Accessibility, etc.
IconInfo.Size: Gets the size of the icon: 20, 24, etc.
IconInfo.Variant: Gets the variant of the icon: Filled, Regular.

FluentImage.__summary__: The Fluent Image component is used to display an image, providing various options for styling and layout.
FluentImage.AlternateText: Gets or sets the alternate text for the image.
FluentImage.Block: Gets or sets the argument ‘block’ so that the image's width will expand to fill the available container space.
FluentImage.Bordered: Gets or sets the border surrounding image.
FluentImage.ChildContent: Gets or sets the image html component.
FluentImage.Class: Gets or sets the CSS class names. If given, these will be included in the class attribute of the component.
FluentImage.Data: Gets or sets custom data, to attach any user data object to the component.
FluentImage.Fit: Gets or sets the fit of the image, determines how it will be scaled and positioned within its parent container.
FluentImage.Height: Gets or sets the height of the image, applies only to the parameter.
FluentImage.Id: Gets or sets the unique identifier.The value will be used as the HTML [global id attribute](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/HTML/Global_attributes/id).
FluentImage.Margin: Gets or sets the component [CSS margin](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/CSS/margin) property.
FluentImage.Padding: Gets or sets the component [CSS padding](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/CSS/padding) property.
FluentImage.Shadow: Gets or sets a box shadow to further separate the image from the background.
FluentImage.Shape: Gets or sets the image shape `ImageShape`
FluentImage.Source: Gets or sets the source link for the image, applies only to the parameter.
FluentImage.Style: Gets or sets the in-line styles. If given, these will be included in the style attribute of the component.
FluentImage.Width: Gets or sets the width of the image, applies only to the parameter.

FluentInputFile.__summary__: Represents a component for handling file uploads with support for drag-and-drop, progress tracking, and filevalidation. _The `FluentInputFile` component provides a flexible and customizable way to upload files            in Blazor applications.  It supports multiple file uploads, file size and type validation, and progress tracking.            The component also includes events  for handling file upload progress, completion, and errors.  Use the `FluentInputFile.Mode` property to specify the file reading mode, such as buffering, saving to a temporary folder, or            streaming. The `FluentInputFile.OnFileUploaded` and `FluentInputFile.OnCompleted` events can be used to handle file upload_
FluentInputFile.Accept: Gets or sets the filter for what file types the user can pick from the file input dialog box.Example: ".gif, .jpg, .png, .doc", "audio/*", "video/*", "image/*"See [https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Attributes/accept](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Attributes/accept)for more information.
FluentInputFile.AnchorId: Gets or sets the identifier of the source component clickable by the end user.
FluentInputFile.BufferSize: Gets or sets the sze of buffer to read bytes from uploaded file (in bytes).Default value is 10 KiB.
FluentInputFile.ChildContent: Gets or sets the child content of the component.
FluentInputFile.Class: Gets or sets the CSS class names. If given, these will be included in the class attribute of the component.
FluentInputFile.Data: Gets or sets custom data, to attach any user data object to the component.
FluentInputFile.Disabled: Disables the form control, ensuring it doesn't participate in form submission.
FluentInputFile.DragDropZoneVisible: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the Drag/Drop zone is visible.Default is true.
FluentInputFile.Height: Gets or sets the component width.
FluentInputFile.Id: Gets or sets the unique identifier.The value will be used as the HTML [global id attribute](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/HTML/Global_attributes/id).
FluentInputFile.Margin: Gets or sets the component [CSS margin](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/CSS/margin) property.
FluentInputFile.MaximumFileCount: To select multiple files, set the maximum number of files allowed to be uploaded.Default value is 10.
FluentInputFile.MaximumFileSize: Gets or sets the maximum size of a file to be uploaded (in bytes).Default value is 10 MiB.
FluentInputFile.Mode: Gets or sets the type of file reading.For SaveToTemporaryFolder, use `FluentInputFileEventArgs.LocalFile` to retrieve the file.For Buffer, use `FluentInputFileEventArgs.Buffer` to retrieve bytes.For Stream, use `FluentInputFileEventArgs.Stream` to have full control over retrieving the file.
FluentInputFile.Multiple: To enable multiple file selection and upload, set the Multiple property to true.Set `FluentInputFile.MaximumFileCount` to change the number of allowed files.
FluentInputFile.OnCompleted: Raise when all files are completely uploaded.
FluentInputFile.OnFileError: Raise when a file raised an error.
FluentInputFile.OnFileUploaded: Raise when a file is completely uploaded.
FluentInputFile.OnInputFileChange: Use the native event raised by the <seealso href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/aspnet/core/blazor/file-uploads">InputFile</seealso> component.If you use this event, the `FluentInputFile.OnFileUploaded` will never be raised.
FluentInputFile.OnProgressChange: Raise when a progression step is updated.You can use `FluentInputFile.ProgressPercent` and `FluentInputFile.ProgressTitle` to have more detail on the progression.
FluentInputFile.Padding: Gets or sets the component [CSS padding](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/CSS/padding) property.
FluentInputFile.ProgressPercent: Gets or sets the current global value of the percentage of a current upload.
FluentInputFile.ProgressPercentChanged: Gets or sets a callback that updates the `FluentInputFile.ProgressPercent`.
FluentInputFile.ProgressTemplate: Gets or sets the progress content of the component.
FluentInputFile.ProgressTitle: Gets the current label display when an upload is in progress.
FluentInputFile.ShowFilesDialogAsync(): Open the dialog-box to select files.Use `FluentInputFile.AnchorId` instead to specify the ID of the button (for example) on which the user should click.⚠️ This method doesn't work on Safari and iOS.
FluentInputFile.Style: Gets or sets the in-line styles. If given, these will be included in the style attribute of the component.
FluentInputFile.Width: Gets or sets the component width.

FluentInputFileBuffer.__summary__: Represents a buffer containing data read from an input source, along with the number of bytes read.
FluentInputFileBuffer.AppendToFileAsync(String): Append the current buffer (Data) to this file.
FluentInputFileBuffer.AppendToFileAsync(FileInfo): Append the current buffer (Data) to this file.
FluentInputFileBuffer.BytesRead: Gets the number of bytes read.

FluentInputFileErrorEventArgs.FileCount: Gets the number of files currently being up.
FluentInputFileErrorEventArgs.FileName: Gets the file concerned by the error.

FluentInputFileEventArgs.AllFiles: Gets a list of all files currently in an upload process.
FluentInputFileEventArgs.Buffer: Gets a small buffer data of the current file in an upload process.Only if Mode = Buffer.
FluentInputFileEventArgs.ContentType: Gets the content type of the current file in an upload process.
FluentInputFileEventArgs.ErrorMessage: Gets the error message (or null if no error occurred).
FluentInputFileEventArgs.Index: Gets the index of the current file in an upload process.
FluentInputFileEventArgs.IsCancelled: Set this property to True to cancel the current upload file.
FluentInputFileEventArgs.LastModified: Gets the last modified date of the current file in an upload process.
FluentInputFileEventArgs.LocalFile: Gets the local file of the current file in an upload process.Only if Mode = SaveToTemporaryFolder (otherwise, this value is null).
FluentInputFileEventArgs.Name: Gets the name of the current file in an upload process.
FluentInputFileEventArgs.ProgressPercent: Gets the global percent value in an upload process.
FluentInputFileEventArgs.ProgressTitle: Gets the label to display in an upload process.
FluentInputFileEventArgs.Size: Gets the size (in bytes) of the current file in an upload process.
FluentInputFileEventArgs.Stream: Gets a reference to the current stream in an upload process.Only if Mode = Stream (otherwise, this value is null).The OnProgressChange event will not be triggered.

ProgressFileDetails.__summary__: Represents the details of a file's progress in a process, including its index, name, and completion percentage.
ProgressFileDetails.Index: The zero-based index of the file in the process.
ProgressFileDetails.Name: The name of the file being processed.
ProgressFileDetails.Percentage: The completion percentage of the file's progress. Must be a value between 0 and 100, inclusive.

UploadedFileDetails.__summary__: Represents the details of an uploaded file, including its name, size, and content type.
UploadedFileDetails.Name: The file that has been uploaded
UploadedFileDetails.Size: The size of the file in bytes

FluentKeyCode.__summary__: Extends the OnKeyDown blazor event to provide a more fluent way to evaluate the key code.The anchor must refer to the ID of an element (or sub-element) accepting the focus.
FluentKeyCode.Anchor: Gets or sets the control identifier associated with the KeyCode engine.If not set, the KeyCode will be applied to the FluentKeyCode content: see `FluentKeyCode.ChildContent`.This attribute is ignored when the `FluentKeyCode.ChildContent` is used..
FluentKeyCode.ChildContent: Gets or sets the content to be managed by the KeyCode engine.
FluentKeyCode.Class: Gets or sets the CSS class names. If given, these will be included in the class attribute of the component.
FluentKeyCode.Data: Gets or sets custom data, to attach any user data object to the component.
FluentKeyCode.GlobalDocument: Gets or sets whether the KeyCode engine is global (using document DOM element) or not (only for `FluentKeyCode.Anchor` or `FluentKeyCode.ChildContent`).
FluentKeyCode.Id: Gets or sets the unique identifier.The value will be used as the HTML [global id attribute](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/HTML/Global_attributes/id).
FluentKeyCode.Ignore: Gets or sets the list of `KeyCode` to ignore when evaluating the key code.
FluentKeyCode.IgnoreModifier: Ignore modifier keys (Shift, Alt, Ctrl, Meta) when evaluating the key code.
FluentKeyCode.Margin: Gets or sets the component [CSS margin](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/CSS/margin) property.
FluentKeyCode.OnKeyDown: Event triggered when a KeyDown event is raised.
FluentKeyCode.OnKeyUp: Event triggered when a KeyUp event is raised.
FluentKeyCode.Only: Gets or sets the list of `KeyCode` to accept, and only this list, when evaluating the key code.
FluentKeyCode.Padding: Gets or sets the component [CSS padding](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/CSS/padding) property.
FluentKeyCode.PreventDefault: Gets or sets a way to tells the user agent that if the event does not get explicitly handled, its default action should not be taken as it normally would be.
FluentKeyCode.PreventDefaultOnly: Gets or sets the list of `KeyCode` to tells the user agent that if the event does not get explicitly handled,its default action should not be taken as it normally would be.
FluentKeyCode.StopPropagation: Gets or sets a way to prevent further propagation of the current event in the capturing and bubbling phases.
FluentKeyCode.StopRepeat: Gets or sets whether the key pressed can be repeated.
FluentKeyCode.Style: Gets or sets the in-line styles. If given, these will be included in the style attribute of the component.
FluentKeyCode.TagName: Gets or sets the HTML tag name to use when rendering the component.The default value is "Span".

FluentKeyCodeEventArgs.__summary__: Event arguments for the `FluentKeyCode.OnKeyDown` and `FluentKeyCode.OnKeyUp` events.
FluentKeyCodeEventArgs.AltKey: Gets a boolean value that indicates if the Alt key was pressed
FluentKeyCodeEventArgs.CtrlKey: Gets a boolean value that indicates if the Control key was pressed
FluentKeyCodeEventArgs.KeyCode: Gets the system- and implementation-dependent numerical code identifying the unmodified value of the pressed key.<see href="https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/KeyboardEvent/keyCode" />
FluentKeyCodeEventArgs.Location: Gets an `KeyLocation` representing the location of the key on the keyboard or other input device.<see href="https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/KeyboardEvent/location" />
FluentKeyCodeEventArgs.MetaKey: Gets a boolean value that indicates if the Meta key was pressed
FluentKeyCodeEventArgs.Name: Gets the name of the event ("keydown" or "keyup").
FluentKeyCodeEventArgs.Repeat: Gets a boolean value that is true if the given key is being held down such that it is automatically repeating.
FluentKeyCodeEventArgs.ShiftKey: Gets a boolean value that indicates if the Shift key was pressed
FluentKeyCodeEventArgs.TargetId: Gets the identifier of the targeted DOM element.
FluentKeyCodeEventArgs.Value: Gets the value of the key pressed by the user

FluentKeyCodeProvider.PreventDefault: Gets or sets a way to tells the user agent that if the event does not get explicitly handled, its default action should not be taken as it normally would be.

FluentKeyPressEventArgs.__summary__: Provides data for a KeyPress event.
FluentKeyPressEventArgs.KeyPress: Gets the key press event data associated with the current operation.
FluentKeyPressEventArgs.Value: Gets the value associated with this instance.

KeyPress.__summary__: Represents a key press event, including the key pressed and associated modifier keys. _The `KeyPress` record provides a way to encapsulate information about a key press event,including the key itself, modifier keys (e.g., Ctrl, Alt, Shift, Meta), and whether the event should be preventedfrom propagating further in the client-side environment._
KeyPress.AltKey: Gets a boolean value that indicates if the Alt key was pressed.Default is false.
KeyPress.AndAltKey(Boolean): Returns a new `KeyPress` instance with the `KeyPress.AltKey` property set to the specified value.
KeyPress.AndCtrlKey(Boolean): Returns a new `KeyPress` instance with the `KeyPress.CtrlKey` property set to the specified value.
KeyPress.AndMetaKey(Boolean): Returns a new `KeyPress` instance with the `KeyPress.MetaKey` property set to the specified value.
KeyPress.AndShiftKey(Boolean): Returns a new `KeyPress` instance with the `KeyPress.ShiftKey` property set to the specified value.
KeyPress.CtrlKey: Gets a boolean value that indicates if the Control key was pressed.Default is false.
KeyPress.For(KeyCode): Creates a new `KeyPress` instance for the specified key.
KeyPress.MetaKey: Gets a boolean value that indicates if the Meta key was pressed.Default is false.
KeyPress.PreventDefault: Gets or sets a boolean value that indicates if the JS client event should be cancelled.Default is true, this means that the key will not be propagated and added to the component value.
KeyPress.ShiftKey: Gets a boolean value that indicates if the Shift key was pressed.Default is false.
KeyPress.WithPreventDefault(Boolean): Returns a new `KeyPress` instance with the `KeyPress.PreventDefault` property set to the specified value.

KeyCodeService.__summary__: Service registered by <see cref="M:Microsoft.FluentUI.AspNetCore.Components.ServiceCollectionExtensions.AddFluentUIComponents(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection,Microsoft.FluentUI.AspNetCore.Components.LibraryConfiguration)" />to catch all keys events and notify all registered listeners.
KeyCodeService.Listeners: Gets the list of all active keystroke listeners.
KeyCodeService.RegisterListener(IKeyCodeListener): Register the listener component or page, and returns a unique identifier.
KeyCodeService.RegisterListener(Func`2): Register the <paramref name="handler" /> method as a listener, and returns a unique identifier.
KeyCodeService.RegisterListener(Func`2, Func`2): Register the <paramref name="handlerKeyDown" /> and <paramref name="handlerKeyUp" /> methods as a listener, and returns a unique identifier.
KeyCodeService.UnregisterListener(IKeyCodeListener): Unregister the listener component or page.

FluentLabel.__summary__: The FluentLabel component is used to display a label for an input component. Normally it is positioned above the component
FluentLabel.ChildContent: Gets or sets the content to be rendered inside the component.
FluentLabel.Class: Gets or sets the CSS class names. If given, these will be included in the class attribute of the component.
FluentLabel.Data: Gets or sets custom data, to attach any user data object to the component.
FluentLabel.Disabled: Gets or sets the disabled state of the label.
FluentLabel.Id: Gets or sets the unique identifier.The value will be used as the HTML [global id attribute](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/HTML/Global_attributes/id).
FluentLabel.Margin: Gets or sets the component [CSS margin](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/CSS/margin) property.
FluentLabel.Padding: Gets or sets the component [CSS padding](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/CSS/padding) property.
FluentLabel.Required: Gets or sets whether the label show a required marking (red star).
FluentLabel.Size: Gets or sets the size of the label.
FluentLabel.Style: Gets or sets the in-line styles. If given, these will be included in the style attribute of the component.
FluentLabel.Tooltip: Gets or sets the tooltip text (supports HTML tags).This parameter requires the presence of a 'FluentTooltipProvider' in your main/layout page. _This parameter cannot be updated after the component has been rendered._
FluentLabel.Weight: Gets or sets the weight of the label text.

FluentLayout.__summary__: Component that defines a layout for a page, using a grid composed of a PanelHeader, a Footer and 3 columns: Menu, Value and Aside Pane.For mobile devices (< 768px), the layout is a single column with the Menu, Value and Footer panes stacked vertically.
FluentLayout.ChildContent: Gets or sets the content to be rendered inside the component.
FluentLayout.Class: Gets or sets the CSS class names. If given, these will be included in the class attribute of the component.
FluentLayout.Data: Gets or sets custom data, to attach any user data object to the component.
FluentLayout.GlobalScrollbar: Gets or sets the vertical scrollbar position:global to the entire LayoutContainer (true), or inside the content area (false).
FluentLayout.Height: Gets or sets the height of the LayoutContainer.
FluentLayout.Id: Gets or sets the unique identifier.The value will be used as the HTML [global id attribute](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/HTML/Global_attributes/id).
FluentLayout.Margin: Gets or sets the component [CSS margin](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/CSS/margin) property.
FluentLayout.MobileBreakdownWidth: Gets or sets the width, in pixels, at which the container switches to a mobile layout.
FluentLayout.NavigationDeferredLoading: Gets or sets whether the `LayoutArea.Navigation` content is rendered only when this area is visible.To reduce the HTML page size, the `FluentLayoutHamburger` is not rendered when the layout is in desktop mode.To use this feature, make sure to enable the Blazor interactive mode.
FluentLayout.OnBreakpointEnter: Event raised when layout changes to a Native layout (true) or Desktop layout (false).
FluentLayout.Padding: Gets or sets the component [CSS padding](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/CSS/padding) property.
FluentLayout.Style: Gets or sets the in-line styles. If given, these will be included in the style attribute of the component.
FluentLayout.Width: Gets ot sets the width of the LayoutContainer.

FluentLayoutHamburger.__summary__: Component to display a hamburger icon that can be used to open and close a menu, on mobile device only.
FluentLayoutHamburger.ChildContent: Gets or sets the content to display when the hamburger menu is open.if not set, the content of the menu area is used.
FluentLayoutHamburger.Class: Gets or sets the CSS class names. If given, these will be included in the class attribute of the component.
FluentLayoutHamburger.Data: Gets or sets custom data, to attach any user data object to the component.
FluentLayoutHamburger.Icon: Gets or sets the icon to display.By default, this icon is a hamburger icon.
FluentLayoutHamburger.IconTitle: Gets or sets the title to display when the user hovers over the hamburger icon.
FluentLayoutHamburger.Id: Gets or sets the unique identifier.The value will be used as the HTML [global id attribute](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/HTML/Global_attributes/id).
FluentLayoutHamburger.Margin: Gets or sets the component [CSS margin](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/CSS/margin) property.
FluentLayoutHamburger.OnOpened: Event that is triggered when the hamburger menu is opened or closed.
FluentLayoutHamburger.Padding: Gets or sets the component [CSS padding](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/CSS/padding) property.
FluentLayoutHamburger.PanelHeader: Gets or sets the header to display when the hamburger menu is open.
FluentLayoutHamburger.PanelHeaderTemplate: Gets or sets the header template to display when the hamburger menu is open.
FluentLayoutHamburger.PanelPosition: Gets or sets the panel position to display when the hamburger menu is open.Only `DialogAlignment.Start` and `DialogAlignment.End` are supported."/>.The default value is `DialogAlignment.Start`.
FluentLayoutHamburger.PanelSize: Gets or sets the size of the panel to display when the hamburger menu is open.Default value is `DialogSize.Medium`.
FluentLayoutHamburger.RefreshAsync(): Asynchronously refreshes the current state of the component.
FluentLayoutHamburger.Style: Gets or sets the in-line styles. If given, these will be included in the style attribute of the component.
FluentLayoutHamburger.Visible: Gets or sets whether the hamburger menu is visible or not.Default is null to display the hamburger icon only when the layout is in mobile mode.

FluentLayoutItem.__summary__: Area of the layout where the item is placed.
FluentLayoutItem.Area: Gets or sets the type of area where the item is placed.
FluentLayoutItem.ChildContent: Gets or sets the contentArea to be rendered inside the component.
FluentLayoutItem.Class: Gets or sets the CSS class names. If given, these will be included in the class attribute of the component.
FluentLayoutItem.Data: Gets or sets custom data, to attach any user data object to the component.
FluentLayoutItem.Height: Gets or sets the height of the item.
FluentLayoutItem.Id: Gets or sets the unique identifier.The value will be used as the HTML [global id attribute](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/HTML/Global_attributes/id).
FluentLayoutItem.Margin: Gets or sets the component [CSS margin](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/CSS/margin) property.
FluentLayoutItem.Padding: Gets or sets the component [CSS padding](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/CSS/padding) property.
FluentLayoutItem.RefreshAsync(): Asynchronously refreshes the current state of the component.
FluentLayoutItem.SCROLLBAR_WIDTH: Gets or sets the Scrollbar Width to compute the correct Aside position.
FluentLayoutItem.Sticky: Gets or sets whether the item is sticky.
FluentLayoutItem.Style: Gets or sets the in-line styles. If given, these will be included in the style attribute of the component.
FluentLayoutItem.Width: Gets ot sets the width of the item.

LayoutHamburgerEventArgs.Id: Gets the ID of the hamburger menu.
LayoutHamburgerEventArgs.Opened: Gets whether the hamburger menu is opened or closed.

FluentLink.__summary__: The FluentLink component specifies relationships between the current document and an external resource.
FluentLink.Appearance: Gets or sets the visual appearance.Default is `LinkAppearance.Default`.
FluentLink.ChildContent: Gets or sets the content to be rendered inside the component.
FluentLink.Class: Gets or sets the CSS class names. If given, these will be included in the class attribute of the component.
FluentLink.Data: Gets or sets custom data, to attach any user data object to the component.

PaginationState.__summary__: Holds state to represent pagination in a `FluentDataGrid`.
PaginationState.CurrentPageIndex: Gets the current zero-based page index. To set it, call <see cref="M:Microsoft.FluentUI.AspNetCore.Components.PaginationState.SetCurrentPageIndexAsync(System.Int32)" />.
PaginationState.ItemsPerPage: Gets or sets the number of items on each page.To set it and update any associated `FluentDataGrid`, call <see cref="M:Microsoft.FluentUI.AspNetCore.Components.PaginationState.SetItemsPerPageAsync(System.Int32)" />
PaginationState.LastPageIndex: Gets the zero-based index of the last page, if known. The value will be null until `PaginationState.TotalItemCount` is known.
PaginationState.SetCurrentPageIndexAsync(Int32): Sets the current page index, and notifies any associated `FluentDataGrid`to fetch and render updated data.
PaginationState.SetItemsPerPageAsync(Int32): Sets the items per page and notifies any associated `FluentDataGrid`to fetch and render updated data.
PaginationState.SetTotalItemCountAsync(Int32, Boolean): Sets the total number of items and makes sure the current page index stays valid.
PaginationState.TotalItemCount: Gets the total number of items across all pages, if known. The value will be null until anassociated `FluentDataGrid` assigns a value after loading data.

FluentRadioGroup`1.Autofocus: Determines if the element should receive document focus on page load.
FluentRadioGroup`1.ChildContent: Gets or sets the child content to be rendering inside the `FluentRadioGroup`.
FluentRadioGroup`1.Class: Gets or sets the CSS class names. If given, these will be included in the class attribute of the component.
FluentRadioGroup`1.Data: Gets or sets custom data, to attach any user data object to the component.
FluentRadioGroup`1.Disabled: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the form control is disabled and doesn't participate in form submission.
FluentRadioGroup`1.FocusLost: Gets a value indicating whether the input component has already lost the focus.As long as the user has been in this field at least once and has left it, this property remains false.As soon as the user leaves the field, it becomes true.
FluentRadioGroup`1.Id: Gets or sets the unique identifier.The value will be used as the HTML [global id attribute](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/HTML/Global_attributes/id).
FluentRadioGroup`1.Label: Gets or sets the text to label the input. This is usually displayed just above the input.
FluentRadioGroup`1.LabelPosition: Gets or sets the position of the label relative to the input.
FluentRadioGroup`1.LabelTemplate: Gets or sets the content to label the input component.This is usually displayed just above the input: see `IFluentField.LabelPosition`
FluentRadioGroup`1.LabelWidth: Gets or sets the width of the label.
FluentRadioGroup`1.Margin: Gets or sets the component [CSS margin](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/CSS/margin) property.
FluentRadioGroup`1.Message: Gets or sets the message to display below the field.
FluentRadioGroup`1.MessageCondition: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the message should be displayed.
FluentRadioGroup`1.MessageIcon: Gets or sets the icon to display next to the message.You can use predefined icons from the `FluentStatus` class.
FluentRadioGroup`1.MessageState: Gets or sets a value that affects the contentof the `IFluentField.Message` and the `IFluentField.MessageIcon`.
FluentRadioGroup`1.MessageTemplate: Gets or sets the template for the message to display below the field.
FluentRadioGroup`1.Name: Gets or sets the name of the element.Allows access by name from the associated form.⚠️ This value needs to be set manually for SSR scenarios to work correctly.
FluentRadioGroup`1.Orientation: Gets or sets the orientation of the group. See `FluentRadioGroup.Orientation`.The default is `Orientation.Horizontal`.
FluentRadioGroup`1.Padding: Gets or sets the component [CSS padding](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/CSS/padding) property.
FluentRadioGroup`1.RadioDisabled: Gets or sets the function used to determine if an radio is disabled.
FluentRadioGroup`1.RadioLabel: Gets or sets the function used to determine which text to display for each radio checkedItem.
FluentRadioGroup`1.RadioValue: Gets or sets the function used to determine which value to apply to the radio value attribute.
FluentRadioGroup`1.ReadOnly: Gets or sets whether the control will be immutable by user interaction.
FluentRadioGroup`1.Required: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the element needs to have a value.
FluentRadioGroup`1.Style: Gets or sets the in-line styles. If given, these will be included in the style attribute of the component.
FluentRadioGroup`1.Wrap: Gets or sets a value indicating whether `FluentRadio` wrapping is enabled.This is applied when the `FluentRadioGroup.Orientation` is set to `Orientation.Horizontal`and there are no effect on the `Orientation.Vertical` orientation.

FluentRatingDisplay.__summary__: Visual representation of content being loaded or processed.
FluentRatingDisplay.Class: Gets or sets the CSS class names. If given, these will be included in the class attribute of the component.
FluentRatingDisplay.Color: Gets or sets the color of the rating display items.
FluentRatingDisplay.Compact: Gets or sets the compact mode.Renders a single filled star, with the value written next to it.
FluentRatingDisplay.Count: Gets or sets the number of ratings represented by the rating value.This will be formatted with a thousands separator (if applicable) and displayed next to the value.
FluentRatingDisplay.Data: Gets or sets custom data, to attach any user data object to the component.
FluentRatingDisplay.Id: Gets or sets the unique identifier.The value will be used as the HTML [global id attribute](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/HTML/Global_attributes/id).
FluentRatingDisplay.Margin: Gets or sets the component [CSS margin](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/CSS/margin) property.
FluentRatingDisplay.Max: Gets or sets the max value of the rating.This controls the number of rating items displayed. Must be a whole number greater than 1
FluentRatingDisplay.Padding: Gets or sets the component [CSS padding](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/CSS/padding) property.
FluentRatingDisplay.Size: Gets or sets the size of the rating items
FluentRatingDisplay.Style: Gets or sets the in-line styles. If given, these will be included in the style attribute of the component.
FluentRatingDisplay.Tooltip: Gets or sets the tooltip text (supports HTML tags).This parameter requires the presence of a 'FluentTooltipProvider' in your main/layout page. _This parameter cannot be updated after the component has been rendered._
FluentRatingDisplay.Value: Gets or sets the value of the rating

FluentSkeleton.__summary__: Represents a skeleton loading component that provides visual placeholders for content while it is being loaded. _The `FluentSkeleton` class is designed to display skeleton shapes, such as rectangles orcircles,  to indicate loading states in a user interface. It supports customization of size, shape, and shimmereffects. Use this component to improve perceived performance by showing placeholders for content that is beingfetched or processed._
FluentSkeleton.ChildContent: Gets or sets the content to be rendered inside the skeleton component.
FluentSkeleton.Circular: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the skeleton in a circular mode.
FluentSkeleton.Class: Gets or sets the CSS class names. If given, these will be included in the class attribute of the component.
FluentSkeleton.Data: Gets or sets custom data, to attach any user data object to the component.
FluentSkeleton.DrawCircle(String): Generates a circular element with the specified radius.
FluentSkeleton.DrawRectangle(String, String): Generates a rectangle element with the specified width and height.
FluentSkeleton.Height: Gets or sets the height of the component. Default is "48px".
FluentSkeleton.Id: Gets or sets the unique identifier.The value will be used as the HTML [global id attribute](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/HTML/Global_attributes/id).
FluentSkeleton.LoadingClass(Nullable`1, UInt32, Boolean: Generates a class name for a loading skeleton based on the specified parameters.
FluentSkeleton.LoadingClass(Func`1, UInt32, Boolean): Generates a class name for a loading skeleton based on the specified parameters.
FluentSkeleton.Margin: Gets or sets the component [CSS margin](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/CSS/margin) property.
FluentSkeleton.Padding: Gets or sets the component [CSS padding](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/CSS/padding) property.
FluentSkeleton.Pattern: Gets or sets the predefined skeleton pattern used to define the structure or layout of the component.You can customize the skeleton's appearance by using `FluentSkeleton.ChildContent`
FluentSkeleton.Shimmer: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the loading effect is visible.
FluentSkeleton.Style: Gets or sets the in-line styles. If given, these will be included in the style attribute of the component.
FluentSkeleton.Visible: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the component is visible.
FluentSkeleton.Width: Gets or sets the width of the element. Default is "100%".

FluentSlider`1.__summary__: FluentSlider component, a slider control that allows users to select from a range of values.

FluentSlider`1.ImmediateDelay: Gets or sets the delay, in milliseconds, before to raise the change event.
FluentSlider`1.Label: Gets or sets the text to label the input. This is usually displayed just above the input.
FluentSlider`1.LabelPosition: Gets or sets the position of the label relative to the input.
FluentSlider`1.LabelTemplate: Gets or sets the content to label the input component.This is usually displayed just above the input: see `IFluentField.LabelPosition`
FluentSlider`1.LabelWidth: Gets or sets the width of the label.
FluentSlider`1.Margin: Gets or sets the component [CSS margin](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/CSS/margin) property.
FluentSlider`1.Max: Gets or sets the slider's maximum value. Default is 100.
FluentSlider`1.Message: Gets or sets the message to display below the field.
FluentSlider`1.MessageCondition: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the message should be displayed.
FluentSlider`1.MessageIcon: Gets or sets the icon to display next to the message.You can use predefined icons from the `FluentStatus` class.
FluentSlider`1.MessageState: Gets or sets a value that affects the contentof the `IFluentField.Message` and the `IFluentField.MessageIcon`.
FluentSlider`1.MessageTemplate: Gets or sets the template for the message to display below the field.
FluentSlider`1.Min: Gets or sets the slider's minimal value. Default is 0.
FluentSlider`1.Name: Gets or sets the name of the element.Allows access by name from the associated form.⚠️ This value needs to be set manually for SSR scenarios to work correctly.
FluentSlider`1.Orientation: Gets or sets the orientation of the component.Default is `Orientation.Horizontal`.
FluentSlider`1.Padding: Gets or sets the component [CSS padding](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/CSS/padding) property.
FluentSlider`1.ReadOnly: Gets or sets whether the control will be immutable by user interaction.
FluentSlider`1.Required: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the element needs to have a value.
FluentSlider`1.Size: Gets or sets the size for the slider.
FluentSlider`1.Step: Gets or sets the slider's step value. Default is 1.
FluentSlider`1.Style: Gets or sets the in-line styles. If given, these will be included in the style attribute of the component.
FluentSlider`1.Tooltip: Gets or sets the tooltip text (supports HTML tags).This parameter requires the presence of a 'FluentTooltipProvider' in your main/layout page. _This parameter cannot be updated after the component has been rendered._

FluentStack.__summary__: A container-type component that can be used to arrange its child components in a horizontal or vertical stack.

FluentStack.HorizontalAlignment: Gets or sets the horizontal alignment of the components in the stack.Default is `HorizontalAlignment.Left`
FluentStack.HorizontalGap: Gets or sets the gap between horizontally stacked components.Default is undefined. You can define the default value in the `LibraryConfiguration.DefaultStyles`.See the CSS [row-gap](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/CSS/row-gap) property.
FluentStack.Id: Gets or sets the unique identifier.The value will be used as the HTML [global id attribute](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/HTML/Global_attributes/id).
FluentStack.Margin: Gets or sets the component [CSS margin](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/CSS/margin) property.
FluentStack.Orientation: Gets or sets the orientation of the stacked components.Default is `Orientation.Horizontal`.
FluentStack.Padding: Gets or sets the component [CSS padding](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/CSS/padding) property.
FluentStack.Reversed: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the stack is reversed.
FluentStack.Style: Gets or sets the in-line styles. If given, these will be included in the style attribute of the component.
FluentStack.VerticalAlignment: Gets or sets the vertical alignment of the components in the stack.Default is `VerticalAlignment.Top`
FluentStack.VerticalGap: Gets or sets the gap between vertically stacked components.Default is undefined. You can define the default value in the `LibraryConfiguration.DefaultStyles`.See the CSS [column-gap](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/CSS/column-gap) property.
FluentStack.Width: Gets or sets the width of the stack as a percentage string (default = 100%).
FluentStack.Wrap: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the stack wraps.

FluentTextInput.Data: Gets or sets custom data, to attach any user data object to the component.
FluentTextInput.DataList: Gets or sets the id of a datalist element that provides a list of suggested values.[datalist](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element/datalist).
FluentTextInput.Disabled: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the form control is disabled and doesn't participate in form submission.
FluentTextInput.EndTemplate: Gets or sets the content to suffix the input component.
FluentTextInput.FocusLost: Gets a value indicating whether the input component has already lost the focus.As long as the user has been in this field at least once and has left it, this property remains false.As soon as the user leaves the field, it becomes true.
FluentTextInput.Id: Gets or sets the unique identifier.The value will be used as the HTML [global id attribute](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/HTML/Global_attributes/id).
FluentTextInput.Immediate: Change the content of this input field when the user write text (based on 'OnInput' HTML event).
FluentTextInput.ImmediateDelay: Gets or sets the delay, in milliseconds, before to raise the   event.
FluentTextInput.InputMode: Gets or sets the type of data that can be entered by the user when editing the element or its content.This allows a browser to display an appropriate virtual keyboard. Not supported by Safari.
FluentTextInput.Label: Gets or sets the text to label the input. This is usually displayed just above the input.
FluentTextInput.LabelPosition: Gets or sets the position of the label relative to the input.
FluentTextInput.LabelTemplate: Gets or sets the content to label the input component.This is usually displayed just above the input: see `IFluentField.LabelPosition`
FluentTextInput.LabelWidth: Gets or sets the width of the label.
FluentTextInput.Margin: Gets or sets the component [CSS margin](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/CSS/margin) property.
FluentTextInput.MaskLazy: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the mask should be applied lazily (only when the user types).The default is false, meaning the `FluentTextInput.MaskPattern` is always visible.
FluentTextInput.MaskPattern: Gets or sets the input mask pattern that defines the allowed format for user input.
FluentTextInput.MaskPlaceholder: Gets or sets the character used to represent unfilled positions in the input mask.The default is "_". Only the first character is used.
FluentTextInput.MaxLength: Gets or sets the maximum number of characters allowed in the input
FluentTextInput.Message: Gets or sets the message to display below the field.
FluentTextInput.MessageCondition: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the message should be displayed.
FluentTextInput.MessageIcon: Gets or sets the icon to display next to the message.You can use predefined icons from the `FluentStatus` class.
FluentTextInput.MessageState: Gets or sets a value that affects the contentof the `IFluentField.Message` and the `IFluentField.MessageIcon`.
FluentTextInput.MessageTemplate: Gets or sets the template for the message to display below the field.
FluentTextInput.MinLength: Gets or sets the minimum number of characters allowed in the input
FluentTextInput.Name: Gets or sets the name of the element.Allows access by name from the associated form.⚠️ This value needs to be set manually for SSR scenarios to work correctly.
FluentTextInput.OnChangeAfterKeyPress: Gets or sets the callback to be invoked when the value changes after a `IFluentComponentChangeAfterKeyPress.ChangeAfterKeyPress` key press.This property must have a `[Parameter]` attribute to be used in the component.
FluentTextInput.Padding: Gets or sets the component [CSS padding](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/CSS/padding) property.
FluentTextInput.Pattern: Gets or sets a regular expression that the value must match to pass validation.
FluentTextInput.Placeholder: Gets or sets the short hint displayed in the input before the user enters a value.
FluentTextInput.ReadOnly: Gets or sets whether the control will be immutable by user interaction.
FluentTextInput.Required: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the element needs to have a value.
FluentTextInput.Size: Gets or sets the size of the input. See `TextInputSize`
FluentTextInput.Spellcheck: Gets or sets a value indicating whether spellcheck should be used.
FluentTextInput.StartTemplate: Gets or sets the content to prefix the input component.
FluentTextInput.Style: Gets or sets the in-line styles. If given, these will be included in the style attribute of the component.
FluentTextInput.TextFieldType: Gets or sets the text filed type. See `TextInputType`
FluentTextInput.Tooltip: Gets or sets the tooltip text (supports HTML tags).This parameter requires the presence of a 'FluentTooltipProvider' in your main/layout page. _This parameter cannot be updated after the component has been rendered._
FluentTextInput.Width: Gets or sets the width of the input field.

FluentText.__summary__: FluentText component, codifies Fluent's opinions on typography to make them easy to use and standardize across products.
FluentText.Align: Gets or sets the alignment of the text.
FluentText.As: Gets or sets the tag to be rendered.
FluentText.Block: Gets or sets if the text is set to block.
FluentText.ChildContent: Gets or sets the content to be shown.
FluentText.Class: Gets or sets the CSS class names. If given, these will be included in the class attribute of the component.
FluentText.Color: Gets or sets the text drawing color.Value comes from the `Color` enumeration. Defaults to Accent.
FluentText.CustomColor: Gets or sets the text drawing color to a custom value.Needs to be formatted as an HTML hex color string (#RRGGBB or #RGB) or CSS variable.⚠️ Only available when Color is set to Color.Custom.
FluentText.Data: Gets or sets custom data, to attach any user data object to the component.
FluentText.Font: Gets or sets the font family of the text.
FluentText.Id: Gets or sets the unique identifier.The value will be used as the HTML [global id attribute](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/HTML/Global_attributes/id).
FluentText.Italic: Gets or sets if the text is shown in italic.
FluentText.Margin: Gets or sets the component [CSS margin](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/CSS/margin) property.
FluentText.Nowrap: Gets or sets if the texts is set to no-wrap.
FluentText.Padding: Gets or sets the component [CSS padding](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/CSS/padding) property.
FluentText.Size: Gets or sets the size of the text.
FluentText.Strikethrough: Gets or sets if the text is shown as strikethrough.
FluentText.Style: Gets or sets the in-line styles. If given, these will be included in the style attribute of the component.
FluentText.Tooltip: Gets or sets the tooltip text (supports HTML tags).This parameter requires the presence of a 'FluentTooltipProvider' in your main/layout page. _This parameter cannot be updated after the component has been rendered._
FluentText.Truncate: Gets or sets if the text should truncate.
FluentText.Underline: Gets or sets is shown underlined .
FluentText.Weight: Gets or sets the weight of the text.

FluentTooltip.__summary__: A FluentTooltip displays additional information about another component.The information is displayed above and near the target component.
FluentTooltip.Anchor: Gets or sets the component identifier associated with the tooltip (Required).
FluentTooltip.ChildContent: Gets or sets the content to be rendered inside the component.
FluentTooltip.Class: Gets or sets the CSS class names. If given, these will be included in the class attribute of the component.
FluentTooltip.Data: Gets or sets custom data, to attach any user data object to the component.
FluentTooltip.Delay: Gets or sets number of milliseconds to delay the tooltip from showing/hiding on hover. Default is 250ms.
FluentTooltip.Id: Gets or sets the unique identifier.The value will be used as the HTML [global id attribute](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/HTML/Global_attributes/id).
FluentTooltip.Margin: Gets or sets the component [CSS margin](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/CSS/margin) property.
FluentTooltip.MaxWidth: Gets or sets the maximum width of tooltip panel. Default is 240px.
FluentTooltip.OnDismissed: Callback for when the tooltip is dismissed.
FluentTooltip.OnToggle: Callback for when the tooltip is opened or closed.
FluentTooltip.Padding: Gets or sets the component [CSS padding](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/CSS/padding) property.
FluentTooltip.Positioning: Gets or sets the tooltip's position. See `Positioning`.
FluentTooltip.SpacingHorizontal: Gets or sets the tooltip's horizontal spacing. Default is 4px;
FluentTooltip.SpacingVertical: Gets or sets the tooltip's horizontal spacing. Default is 4px;
FluentTooltip.Style: Gets or sets the in-line styles. If given, these will be included in the style attribute of the component.
FluentTooltip.UseTooltipService: Use ITooltipService to create the tooltip, if this service was injected.If the `FluentTooltip.ChildContent` is dynamic, set this to false. Default, true.

FluentTooltipProvider.Class: Gets or sets the CSS class names. If given, these will be included in the class attribute of the component.
FluentTooltipProvider.Data: Gets or sets custom data, to attach any user data object to the component.
FluentTooltipProvider.Id: Gets or sets the unique identifier.The value will be used as the HTML [global id attribute](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/HTML/Global_attributes/id).
FluentTooltipProvider.Margin: Gets or sets the component [CSS margin](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/CSS/margin) property.
FluentTooltipProvider.Padding: Gets or sets the component [CSS padding](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/CSS/padding) property.
FluentTooltipProvider.Style: Gets or sets the in-line styles. If given, these will be included in the style attribute of the component.

LibraryTooltipOptions.__summary__: Options for the Fluent UI Blazor component library.
LibraryTooltipOptions.UseServiceProvider: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the library should use the TooltipServiceProvider.If set to true, add the FluentTooltipProvider component at end of the MainLayout.razor page.

TooltipEventArgs.__summary__: Event arguments for the FluentTooltip component.
TooltipEventArgs.Id: Gets the component identifier associated with the tooltip.
TooltipEventArgs.Opened: Gets a value indicating whether the tooltip is opened or closed.

FluentTreeItem.__summary__: Represents a tree item in a `FluentTreeView`.
FluentTreeItem.Appearance: Gets or sets the appearance of the tree item.Default is `TreeAppearance.Subtle`.
FluentTreeItem.ChildContent: Gets or sets the content to be rendered inside the component.
FluentTreeItem.Class: Gets or sets the CSS class names. If given, these will be included in the class attribute of the component.
FluentTreeItem.Data: Gets or sets custom data, to attach any user data object to the component.
FluentTreeItem.Expanded: Returns <see langword="true" /> if the tree item is expanded,and <see langword="false" /> if collapsed.
FluentTreeItem.Height: Gets or sets the height of the tree item.
FluentTreeItem.IconAside: Gets or sets the `Icon` displayed at the "far end" of item content.We recommend using an icon size of 16px.
FluentTreeItem.IconCollapsed: Gets or sets the `Icon` displayed to indicate the tree item is collapsed.If this icon is not set, the `FluentTreeItem.IconExpanded` will be used.We recommend using an icon size of 16px.
FluentTreeItem.IconEnd: Gets or sets the `Icon` displayed at the end of item content.We recommend using an icon size of 16px.
FluentTreeItem.IconExpanded: Gets or sets the `Icon` displayed to indicate the tree item is expanded.If this icon is not set, the `FluentTreeItem.IconCollapsed` will be used.A 90-degree rotation effect is applied to the icon.Please select an icon that will look correct after rotation.We recommend using an icon size of 16px.
FluentTreeItem.IconStart: Gets or sets the `Icon` displayed at the start of item content.We recommend using an icon size of 16px.
FluentTreeItem.Id: Gets or sets the unique identifier.The value will be used as the HTML [global id attribute](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/HTML/Global_attributes/id).
FluentTreeItem.Item: Gets the item associated with the current element, based on its Id.
FluentTreeItem.Items: Gets or sets the list of sub-items to bind to the tree item
FluentTreeItem.Margin: Gets or sets the component [CSS margin](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/CSS/margin) property.
FluentTreeItem.Padding: Gets or sets the component [CSS padding](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/CSS/padding) property.
FluentTreeItem.SelectedChanged: Called whenever the selected item changes.
FluentTreeItem.Size: Gets or sets the size of the tree item.Default is `TreeSize.Medium`.
FluentTreeItem.Style: Gets or sets the in-line styles. If given, these will be included in the style attribute of the component.
FluentTreeItem.Text: Gets or sets the text of the tree item.If this text is too long, it will be truncated with ellipsis.

FluentTreeView.Appearance: Gets or sets the appearance of the tree. Default is `TreeAppearance.Subtle`.
FluentTreeView.ChildContent: Gets or sets the content to be rendered inside the component.
FluentTreeView.Class: Gets or sets the CSS class names. If given, these will be included in the class attribute of the component.
FluentTreeView.CurrentSelected: Gets or sets the selected `FluentTreeItem` item.
FluentTreeView.Data: Gets or sets custom data, to attach any user data object to the component.
FluentTreeView.HideSelection: Gets or sets whether the tree view element is not highlighted to indicate that it is selected.
FluentTreeView.Id: Gets or sets the unique identifier.The value will be used as the HTML [global id attribute](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/HTML/Global_attributes/id).
FluentTreeView.Items: Gets or sets the list of items to bind to the tree.
FluentTreeView.ItemTemplate: Gets or sets the template for rendering tree items.
FluentTreeView.LazyLoadItems: Can only be used when the `FluentTreeView.Items` is defined.Gets or sets whether the tree should use lazy loading when expanding nodes.If True, the tree will only render the children of a node when it is expanded and will remove them when it is collapsed.
FluentTreeView.Margin: Gets or sets the component [CSS margin](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/CSS/margin) property.
FluentTreeView.MultipleSelectionVisibility: Gets or sets the visibility of the multi-selection checkbox.By default all items are visible.
FluentTreeView.OnExpandedChanged: Called whenever `FluentTreeItem.Expanded` changes on an item within the tree.You cannot update FluentTreeItem properties.
FluentTreeView.OnSelectedChanged: Called whenever the selected item changes.You cannot update FluentTreeItem properties.
FluentTreeView.Padding: Gets or sets the component [CSS padding](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/CSS/padding) property.
FluentTreeView.SelectedId: Gets or sets the selected item id.
FluentTreeView.SelectedIdChanged: Called whenever the selected item changes.
FluentTreeView.SelectedItem: Gets or sets the selected `ITreeViewItem` item.
FluentTreeView.SelectedItems: Gets or sets the multi-selected `ITreeViewItem` items.
FluentTreeView.SelectionMode: Gets or sets whether the tree allows multiple selections.This Multiple Selection feature is only available when the `FluentTreeView.Items` parameter is used to generate the tree.By default, the tree allows only single selection.
FluentTreeView.Size: Gets or sets the size of the tree. Default is `TreeSize.Medium`.
FluentTreeView.Style: Gets or sets the in-line styles. If given, these will be included in the style attribute of the component.

TreeViewItem.Expanded: Gets or sets a value indicating the default state of the tree item.
TreeViewItem.IconAside: Gets or sets the `Icon` displayed at the "far end" of item content.We recommend using an icon size of 16px.
TreeViewItem.IconCollapsed: Gets or sets the `Icon` displayed to indicate the tree item is collapsed.If this icon is not set, the `ITreeViewItem.IconExpanded` will be used.We recommend using an icon size of 16px.
TreeViewItem.IconEnd: Gets or sets the `Icon` displayed at the end of item content.We recommend using an icon size of 16px.
TreeViewItem.IconExpanded: Gets or sets the `Icon` displayed to indicate the tree item is expanded.If this icon is not set, the `ITreeViewItem.IconCollapsed` will be used.A 90-degree rotation effect is applied to the icon.Please select an icon that will look correct after rotation.We recommend using an icon size of 16px.
TreeViewItem.IconStart: Gets or sets the `Icon` displayed at the start of item content.We recommend using an icon size of 16px.
TreeViewItem.Id: Gets or sets the unique identifier of the tree item.
TreeViewItem.Items: Gets or sets the sub-items of the tree item.
TreeViewItem.LoadingTreeViewItems(String): Returns an array with a single `TreeViewItem` that represents a loading state.
TreeViewItem.OnExpandedAsync: Gets or sets the action to be performed when the tree item is expanded or collapsed
TreeViewItem.Text: Gets or sets the text of the tree item.If this text is too long, it will be truncated with ellipsis.

TreeViewItemExpandedEventArgs.__summary__: Class that contains the event arguments for the `ITreeViewItem.OnExpandedAsync` event.
TreeViewItemExpandedEventArgs.CurrentItem: Gets the `ITreeViewItem` that was expanded or collapsed.
TreeViewItemExpandedEventArgs.Expanded: Gets a value indicating whether the item was expanded or collapsed.

AccordionExpandMode.__summary__: The expand mode of the `FluentAccordion` component.
AccordionExpandMode.Multi: The accordion allows multiple items expanded at a time.
AccordionExpandMode.Single: The accordion only allows a single expanded item at a time.

AccordionItemMarkerPosition.__summary__: The position of the expanded/collapsed marker

AccordionItemSize.__summary__: Represents the size options for an avatar.

AriaLive.__summary__: The aria-live attribute in HTML is used to inform assistive technologies (like screen readers) about updates to dynamic content.It helps ensure that users with disabilities are notified when content changes on the page without requiring them to manually check.
AriaLive.Assertive: Updates are announced immediately, interrupting whatever the screen reader is currently reading.Use this only for critical or time-sensitive information, such as error messages or alerts.
AriaLive.Off: Updates to the region will not be announced by screen readers.Use this when the content is not important for accessibility.
AriaLive.Polite: Updates are announced at the next available opportunity, without interrupting the current speech.Ideal for non-urgent updates like status messages or background changes.

AvatarActiveAppearance.__summary__: Indicates the styled appearance of the avatar when active is set to Active.
AvatarActiveAppearance.Ring: Default value, the avatar will be decorated with a ring.
AvatarActiveAppearance.RingShadow: The avatar will be decorated with a ring and shadow.
AvatarActiveAppearance.Shadow: The avatar will be decorated with a shadow.

AvatarColor.__summary__: Represents the color options for an avatar.

AvatarShape.__summary__: Indicates the shape of the avatar.

AvatarSize.__summary__: Represents the size options for an avatar.

BadgeSize.ExtraLarge: Badge is displayed in extra large size
BadgeSize.ExtraSmall: Badge is displayed in extra small size
BadgeSize.Large: Badge is displayed in large size
BadgeSize.Medium: Badge is displayed in medium size
BadgeSize.Small: Badge is displayed in small size
BadgeSize.Tiny: Badge is displayed in tiny size

ButtonAppearance.Default: The button appears with the default style
ButtonAppearance.Primary: Emphasizes the button as a primary action.
ButtonAppearance.Subtle: Minimizes emphasis to blend into the background until hovered or focused

CalendarDayFormat.__summary__: Defines the format of days shown in a `FluentCalendar` component.

CalendarSelectMode.__summary__: Specifies the selection mode for a calendar control.
CalendarSelectMode.Range: Allow a contiguous range of selected dates.

CalendarViews.__summary__: Defines the view display in a `FluentCalendar` component.

CardAppearance.Default: The card appears with the default style.
CardAppearance.Filled: The card is being displayed on a lighter gray or white surface.
CardAppearance.Outline: Use when you don't want a filled background color but a discernable outline (border) on the card.
CardAppearance.Subtle: This variant doesn't have a background or border for the card container.

CardShadow.Default: The shadow is 4px below the card.
CardShadow.Large: The shadow is 16px below the card.
CardShadow.Medium: The shadow is 8px below the card.
CardShadow.Small: The shadow is 2px below the card.

CheckboxShape.Circular: The appearance where the border is circular.
CheckboxShape.Square: The default appearance. The border is square.

Color.__summary__: The color to use for the drawing icons, badges, etc.TODO: WEB3 - To validate if these colors are still valid.
Color.Custom: Supply an HTML hex color string value (#rrggbb or #rgb) for the CustomColor parameter.
Color.Default: Use the '--colorNeutralForeground1' CSS variable color to draw the icon. Icon is drawn in the same color as the standard text.
Color.Disabled: Use the `--colorNeutralForegroundDisabled` CSS variable color, adapts to light/dark mode.
Color.Error: Use the '--error' CSS variable color.Note: This color is defined in the variables.css file. If this file is not being used, a CSS variable with this name and appropriate value needs to be created.
Color.Info: Use the '--info' CSS variable color.Note: This color is defined in the variables.css file. If this file is not being used, a CSS variable with this name and appropriate value needs to be created.
Color.Lightweight: Use the '--colorNeutralForegroundInverted' CSS variable color, adapts to light/dark mode.
Color.Primary: Use the '--colorBrandForeground1' CSS variable color.This is the default value.
Color.Success: Use the '--success' CSS variable color.Note: This color is defined in the variables.css file. If this file is not being used, a CSS variable with this name and appropriate value needs to be created.
Color.Warning: Use the '--warning' CSS variable color.Note: This color is defined in the variables.css file. If this file is not being used, a CSS variable with this name and appropriate value needs to be created.

DataGridCellAlignment.__summary__: The horizontal alignment of content in a `FluentDataGridCell`.

DataGridDisplayMode.__summary__: The type of rendering to use for the `FluentDataGrid`
DataGridDisplayMode.Grid: Uses display:grid with HTML table elements to render the DataGrid.With this mode fr units can be used to set the column widths.
DataGridDisplayMode.Table: Uses HTML table elements only to render the DataGrid.With this mode fr units cannot be used to set the column widths.

DataGridGeneratedHeaderType.__summary__: The option for generating a header for the `FluentDataGrid`.

DataGridResizeType.Discrete: Resize datagrid columns by discreet steps of 10 pixels
DataGridResizeType.Exact: Resize datagrid columns by exact pixel values

DataGridRowSize.__summary__: The height of each `FluentDataGridRow` in a `FluentDataGrid`.Values are in pixels.

DataGridSelectMode.__summary__: How rows can be selected in a `FluentDataGrid` when using a `SelectColumn`.
DataGridSelectMode.SingleSticky: Allow only one selected row. Keep selection if same row is clicked.

DataGridSortDirection.__summary__: Describes the direction in which a `FluentDataGrid` column is sorted.
DataGridSortDirection.Auto: Automatic sort order. When used with <see cref="M:Microsoft.FluentUI.AspNetCore.Components.FluentDataGrid.SortByColumnAsync(Microsoft.FluentUI.AspNetCore.Components.ColumnBase{`0},Microsoft.FluentUI.AspNetCore.Components.DataGridSortDirection)" />,the sort order will automatically toggle between `DataGridSortDirection.Ascending` and `DataGridSortDirection.Descending` on successive calls, andresets to `DataGridSortDirection.Ascending` whenever the specified column is changed.

DialogSize.__summary__: Represents the size of a dialog or a drawer (panel).
DialogSize.Full: The width of the dialog or drawer is 100%.
DialogSize.Large: The width of the dialog or drawer is 940px.
DialogSize.Medium: The width of the dialog or drawer is 592px.
DialogSize.Small: The width of the dialog or drawer is 320px.

DialogState.__summary__: Represents the state of a dialog.

DividerAlignContent.Center: The content is aligned at the center.
DividerAlignContent.End: The content is aligned at the end.
DividerAlignContent.Start: The content is aligned at the start.

DividerAppearance.Brand: The divider appears with the brand style.
DividerAppearance.Default: The divider appears with the default style.
DividerAppearance.Strong: The divider appears with the strong style.
DividerAppearance.Subtle: The divider appears with the subtle style.

EmojiGroup.__summary__: The collection of groups emojis are placed in

EmojiSize.__summary__: The size of the emoji (in multiples of 32).Defauts to Size32

ErrorBoundaryDetails.__summary__: The details to display in the `FluentErrorBoundary`.
ErrorBoundaryDetails.ErrorMessage: The error boundary displays the exception message about the error.
ErrorBoundaryDetails.ErrorStack: The error boundary displays the stack trace of the error.
ErrorBoundaryDetails.None: The error boundary does not display any details about the error.

FieldSize.__summary__: The size of the label in a `FluentField`.

FluentKeyCodeTag.__summary__: Represents the HTML tag names that can be used with the FluentKeyCode component.

GridItemHidden.__summary__: Hide the `FluentGridItem` when a size condition is met.

GridItemSize.__summary__: Size available for `FluentGrid` when a Resize event raised.

HorizontalAlignment.__summary__: Determines the horizontal alignment of the content within the `FluentStack`.
HorizontalAlignment.Baseline: Aligns content at the baseline of the container.
HorizontalAlignment.End: The content is aligned to the end.
HorizontalAlignment.Left: The content is aligned to the left.Use `HorizontalAlignment.Start` for better RTL support.
HorizontalAlignment.Right: The content is aligned to the right.Use `HorizontalAlignment.End` for better RTL support.
HorizontalAlignment.SpaceBetween: The items are evenly distributed within the alignment container along the main axis.
HorizontalAlignment.Start: The content is aligned to the start.
HorizontalAlignment.Stretch: The content is stretched to fill the available space.

IconSize.Custom: Custom size included in the SVG content.

IconVariant.Filled: Filled variant of FluentUI System Icons
IconVariant.Light: Light variant of FluentUI System Icons
IconVariant.Regular: Regular variant of FluentUI System Icons

ImageFit.__summary__: Determines how the image will be scaled and positioned within its parent container.
ImageFit.Center: The image will be centered in its container without changing its original size.
ImageFit.Contain: The image will be scaled to fit within its container while maintaining its aspect ratio.
ImageFit.Cover: The image will be scaled to cover the entire container while maintaining its aspect ratio.
ImageFit.None: The image will not be resized or repositioned.

ImageShape.Circular: The image will be displayed as a circle.
ImageShape.Rounded: The image will be displayed as a rounded rectangle.
ImageShape.Square: The image will be displayed as a square.

InputFileMode.__summary__: How to handle the input file(s).
InputFileMode.Buffer: Files are read into a buffer. Use `FluentInputFileEventArgs.Buffer` to retrieve bytes.
InputFileMode.SaveToTemporaryFolder: Uploaded files are saved to a temporary folder.
InputFileMode.Stream: In Blazor Server, file data is streamed over the SignalR connection into .NET code on the server as the file is read.In Blazor WebAssembly, file data is streamed directly into the .NET code within the browser.

JustifyContent.__summary__: Defines the alignment of items along the main axis of a flex container.

KeyCode.__summary__: Represents a set of key codes corresponding to keyboard keys and other input controls.

KeyLocation.__summary__: the location of the key on the keyboard or other input device
KeyLocation.Left: The key was the left-hand version of the key; for example, the left-hand Control key was pressed on a standard 101 key US keyboard. This value is only used for keys that have more than one possible location on the keyboard.
KeyLocation.NumPad: The key was on the numeric keypad, or has a virtual key code that corresponds to the numeric keypad.
KeyLocation.Right: The key was the right-hand version of the key; for example, the right-hand Control key is pressed on a standard 101 key US keyboard. This value is only used for keys that have more than one possible location on the keyboard.
KeyLocation.Standard: The key has only one version, or can't be distinguished between the left and right versions of the key, and was not pressed on the numeric keypad or a key that is considered to be part of the keypad.

LabelPosition.__summary__: Represents the position of the label relative to the input.
LabelPosition.Above: The label is positioned above the input.
LabelPosition.After: The label is positioned after the input.
LabelPosition.Before: The label is positioned before the input.

LinkAppearance.Default: The link appears with the default style
LinkAppearance.Subtle: Only the underlined style is retained on hovering

LinkReferrerPolicy.__summary__: Indicating which referrer to use when fetching the resource
LinkReferrerPolicy.NoReferrer: The Referer header will not be sent.
LinkReferrerPolicy.NoReferrerWhenDowngrade: No Referer header will be sent when navigating to an origin without TLS (HTTPS).
LinkReferrerPolicy.Origin: The referrer will be the origin of the page, which is roughly the scheme, the host, and the port.
LinkReferrerPolicy.OriginWhenCrossOrigin: Navigation to other origins is limited to scheme, host, and port, while same-origin navigation includes the referrer’s path.
LinkReferrerPolicy.UnsafeUrl: The referrer will include the origin and the path (but not the fragment, password, or username)

LinkRel.__summary__: Relationship of the linked document to the current document.
LinkRel.Alternate: Alternate representations of the current document.
LinkRel.Author: Author of the current document or article.
LinkRel.Canonical: Preferred URL for the current document.
LinkRel.Expect: Allows the page to be render-blocked until the essential parts of the document are parsed so it will render consistently.
LinkRel.License: Indicates that the main content of the current document is covered by the copyright license described by the referenced document.
LinkRel.Me: Indicates that the current document represents the person who owns the linked content.
LinkRel.Next: Indicates that the current document is a part of a series and that the next document in the series is the referenced document.
LinkRel.Prev: Indicates that the current document is a part of a series and that the previous document in the series is the referenced document.
LinkRel.PrivacyPolicy: Gives a link to a information about the data collection and usage practices that apply to the current document.
LinkRel.Search: Gives a link to a resource that can be used to search through the current document and its related pages.
LinkRel.TermsOfService: Link to the agreement, or terms of service, between the document's provider and users who wish to use the document.

LinkTarget.__summary__: Defines the frame or window name that has the defined linking relationship.
LinkTarget.Blank: Load the designated document in a new, unnamed window.
LinkTarget.Parent: Load the document into the immediate FRAMESET parent of the current frame. This value is equivalent to _self if the current frame has no parent.
LinkTarget.Self: Load the document in the same frame as the element that refers to this target.
LinkTarget.Top: Load the document into the full, original window (thus canceling all other frames). This value is equivalent to _self if the current frame has no parent.

MessageBarLayout.MultiLine: The message bar actions are displayed on a new line, allowing for more space for the message content.
MessageBarLayout.Notification: The title, message, and actions are displayed on separate lines, providing a clear and structured layout.
MessageBarLayout.SingleLine: The message bar actions are displayed next to the message content, allowing for a compact layout.

MessageState.__summary__: Represents the type of content to display in the message (and the associated icon).
MessageState.Error: Display a red error message text and red error icon.
MessageState.Success: Display a gray success message text and green checkmark icon.
MessageState.Warning: Display a gray message text and yellow exclamation icon.

Positioning.__summary__: Determines the placement of aligned content relative to the base content.This is used for example in the `FluentCounterBadge` component.
Positioning.Above: The content is aligned above and at the center.
Positioning.AboveEnd: The content is aligned above and at the end.
Positioning.AboveStart: The content is aligned above and at the start.
Positioning.After: The content is aligned after and at the center.
Positioning.AfterBottom: The content is aligned after and at the bottom.
Positioning.AfterTop: The content is aligned after and at the top.
Positioning.Before: The content is aligned before and at the center.
Positioning.BeforeBottom: The content is aligned before and at the bottom.
Positioning.BeforeTop: The content is aligned before and at the top.
Positioning.Below: The content is aligned below and at the center.
Positioning.BelowEnd: The content is aligned below and at the end.
Positioning.BelowStart: The content is aligned below and at the start.
Positioning.CenterCenter: The content is aligned in the center.

ProgressShape.__summary__: Represents the shape of the progress bar.

ProgressShape.Square: Display progress bar with square corners.

ProgressState.__summary__: Represents the validation state of the progress bar.

ProgressThickness.__summary__: List of thickness sizes for the progress component.
