SkeletonPattern.__summary__: Defines the available patterns for displaying skeleton loading placeholders.
SkeletonPattern.Icon: Represents a circular icon that can be displayed in the user interface.
SkeletonPattern.IconTitle: Represents a combination of a circular icon and a title, on the same line.
SkeletonPattern.IconTitleContent: Represents a combination of a circular icon and a title, on the same line.And a content area below the title.

TabsAppearance.Subtle: Minimizes emphasis to blend into the background until hovered or focused.
TabsAppearance.Transparent: No background and border styling. This is the default value.

TabsSize.Medium: Medium tabs. This is the default size.

TextAlign.__summary__: Indicates the alignment of the text shown in the `FluentText`.

TextAreaAppearance.FilledDarker: The appearance where the borders are filled with a darker color.
TextAreaAppearance.FilledDarkerShadow: The appearance where the borders are filled with a darker color with shadow.
TextAreaAppearance.FilledLighter: The appearance where the borders are filled with a lighter color.
TextAreaAppearance.FilledLighterShadow: The appearance where the borders are filled with a lighter color with shadow.

TextAreaResize.__summary__: Whether and how a user can resize the element. `TextAreaResize`.
TextAreaResize.Both: The appearance where the borders are filled with a lighter color.
TextAreaResize.Horizontal: The appearance where the borders are filled with a darker color.
TextAreaResize.Vertical: The appearance where the borders are filled with a darker color.

TextFont.__summary__: Indicates the font family of the text shown in the `FluentText`.

TextInputAppearance.FilledDarker: The appearance where the borders are filled with a darker color.
TextInputAppearance.FilledLighter: The appearance where the borders are filled with a lighter color.
TextInputAppearance.Underline: The appearance where a single line is drawn under the text.

TextInputMode.__summary__: Global attribute is an enumerated attribute that hints at the type of data that might be entered by the user while editing the element or its contents.This allows a browser to display an appropriate virtual keyboard.
TextInputMode.Decimal: Fractional numeric input keyboard containing the digits and decimal separator for the user's locale (typically . or ,). Devices may or may not show a minus key (-).
TextInputMode.Email: A virtual keyboard optimized for entering email addresses. Typically includes the @character as well as other optimizations.
TextInputMode.None: No virtual keyboard. For when the page implements its own keyboard input control.
TextInputMode.Numeric: Numeric input keyboard, but only requires the digits 0–9. Devices may or may not show a minus key.
TextInputMode.Search: A virtual keyboard optimized for search input. For instance, the return/submit key may be labeled "Search", along with possible other optimizations.
TextInputMode.Telephone: A telephone keypad input, including the digits 0–9, the asterisk (*), and the pound (#) key.
TextInputMode.Text: Standard input keyboard for the user's current locale. (default value)
TextInputMode.Url: A keypad optimized for entering URLs. This may have the / key more prominent, for example. Enhanced features could include history access and so on.

TextInputType.__summary__: Describes the type of input of a `FluentTextInput`.
TextInputType.Email: A text field that is used for email address input.
TextInputType.Password: A text field that is used for password input.
TextInputType.Telephone: A text field that is used for telephone number input.
TextInputType.Text: The default type of text field
TextInputType.Url: A text field that is used for URL input.

TextSize.__summary__: Indicates the size of the text shown in the `FluentText`.

TextTag.__summary__: Indicates the tag to render in the `FluentText`.

TextWeight.__summary__: Indicates the weight of the text shown in the `FluentText`.

TreeSelectionMode.__summary__: Specifies the selection mode for a `FluentTreeView` component.

TreeSelectionMode.Single: The user can select only one item at a time.

TreeSelectionVisibility.__summary__: Specifies the selection mode for a `FluentTreeView` component.
TreeSelectionVisibility.Collapse: The checkbox is invisible (not drawn), and the space it would take up is collapsed.
TreeSelectionVisibility.Hidden: The checkbox is invisible (not drawn), but still affects layout as normal.

TreeSize.__summary__: Sets the visual size of the `FluentTreeView` or the `FluentTreeItem`

VerticalAlignment.__summary__: Determines the vertical alignment of the content within the `FluentStack`.
VerticalAlignment.Bottom: The content is aligned to the bottom
VerticalAlignment.SpaceBetween: The items are evenly distributed within the alignment container along the main axis.
VerticalAlignment.Stretch: The content is stretched to fill the available space.

AccordionItemEventArgs.Expanded: Gets or sets the expanded state of the accordion item.
AccordionItemEventArgs.HeaderText: Gets or sets the header text of the accordion item.When the item is expanded/collapsed by user interaction, this property is set to the innerText value of the item that was clicked.When an item is expanded/collapsed programmatically, this property is set to the value of the header parameter.

AccordionItemEventArgs.Item: Gets the item that was changed.

DropdownEventArgs.Type: Gets or sets the type of the list.

DefaultStyles.__summary__: Defines the global Fluent UI Blazor component library services configuration
DefaultStyles.FluentFieldClass: Gets or sets the default CSS class for the FluentField component, used with all the input components.The default value is "my-3-o", an overridable "my-3" class. Spacing between text fields and other components is 12 pixels.
DefaultStyles.FluentStackHorizontalGap: Gets or sets the gap between horizontally stacked components.Default is undefined. For example, you can use `var(--spacingHorizontalM)` (12px).See the CSS [row-gap](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/CSS/row-gap) property.
DefaultStyles.FluentStackVerticalGap: Gets or sets the gap between vertically stacked components.Default is undefined. For example, you can use `var(--spacingVerticalM)` (12px).See the CSS [column-gap](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/CSS/column-gap) property.

DefaultValuesComponentBuilder`1.__summary__: Provides functionality to configure default values for component parameters of type <typeparamref name="TComponent" />.

FluentProviders.Class: Gets or sets the CSS class names. If given, these will be included in the class attribute of the component.
FluentProviders.Data: Gets or sets custom data, to attach any user data object to the component.
FluentProviders.Id: Gets or sets the unique identifier.The value will be used as the HTML [global id attribute](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/HTML/Global_attributes/id).
FluentProviders.Margin: Gets or sets the component [CSS margin](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/CSS/margin) property.
FluentProviders.Padding: Gets or sets the component [CSS padding](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/CSS/padding) property.
FluentProviders.Style: Gets or sets the in-line styles. If given, these will be included in the style attribute of the component.

LibraryConfiguration.__summary__: Defines the global Fluent UI Blazor component library services configuration
LibraryConfiguration.DefaultStyles: Gets the default CSS class and styles for the library components.
LibraryConfiguration.DefaultValues: Gets the default CSS class and styles for the library components.
LibraryConfiguration.Localizer: Gets or sets the FluentLocalizer instance used to localize the library components.
LibraryConfiguration.ServiceLifetime: Gets or sets the service lifetime for the library services, when using Fluent UI in WebAssembly, it can make sense to use [Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.ServiceLifetime.Singleton](https://learn.microsoft.com/dotnet/api/Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.ServiceLifetime.Singleton).Default is [Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.ServiceLifetime.Scoped](https://learn.microsoft.com/dotnet/api/Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.ServiceLifetime.Scoped).<para>Only [Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.ServiceLifetime.Scoped](https://learn.microsoft.com/dotnet/api/Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.ServiceLifetime.Scoped) and [Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.ServiceLifetime.Singleton](https://learn.microsoft.com/dotnet/api/Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.ServiceLifetime.Singleton) are supported.</para>
LibraryConfiguration.Tooltip: Gets the options for the library tooltip.

FluentProgress.__summary__: Visual representation of content being loaded or processed.This component is renamed to `FluentProgressBar` and will be removed in a future release.
FluentProgress.BackgroundColor: Gets or sets the background color of the progress bar.
FluentProgress.Class: Gets or sets the CSS class names. If given, these will be included in the class attribute of the component.
FluentProgress.Color: Gets or sets the color of the progress bar.This property is not used when the `FluentProgressBar.State` property is set.
FluentProgress.Data: Gets or sets custom data, to attach any user data object to the component.
FluentProgress.Id: Gets or sets the unique identifier.The value will be used as the HTML [global id attribute](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/HTML/Global_attributes/id).
FluentProgress.Margin: Gets or sets the component [CSS margin](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/CSS/margin) property.
FluentProgress.Max: Gets or sets the maximum value.The FluentProgressBar bar will be full when value equals `FluentProgressBar.Max`.
FluentProgress.Min: Gets or sets the minimum value.
FluentProgress.Padding: Gets or sets the component [CSS padding](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/CSS/padding) property.
FluentProgress.Shape: Gets or sets the shape of the progress bar: rounded or square.
FluentProgress.State: Gets or sets the validation state of the progress bar: Success, Warning or Error.
FluentProgress.Style: Gets or sets the in-line styles. If given, these will be included in the style attribute of the component.
FluentProgress.Thickness: Gets or sets the stroke width of the progress bar.
FluentProgress.Tooltip: Gets or sets the tooltip text (supports HTML tags).This parameter requires the presence of a 'FluentTooltipProvider' in your main/layout page. _This parameter cannot be updated after the component has been rendered._
FluentProgress.Value: Gets or sets the current value.If `null` (default), the FluentProgressBar will display an indeterminate state.
FluentProgress.Visible: Gets or sets the visibility of the component.If `true` (default), the component is visible.If `false`, the component is hidden.If `null`, the component is hidden and not rendered.
FluentProgress.Width: Gets or sets the component width.

FluentProgressRing.__summary__: A spinner alerts a user that content is being loaded or processed and they should wait for the activity to complete.This component is renamed to `FluentSpinner` and will be removed in a future release.
FluentProgressRing.AppearanceInverted: Gets or sets whether the spinner should be shown in an inverted color scheme (i.e. light spinner on dark background)
FluentProgressRing.Class: Gets or sets the CSS class names. If given, these will be included in the class attribute of the component.
FluentProgressRing.Data: Gets or sets custom data, to attach any user data object to the component.
FluentProgressRing.Id: Gets or sets the unique identifier.The value will be used as the HTML [global id attribute](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/HTML/Global_attributes/id).
FluentProgressRing.Margin: Gets or sets the component [CSS margin](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/CSS/margin) property.
FluentProgressRing.Padding: Gets or sets the component [CSS padding](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/CSS/padding) property.
FluentProgressRing.Size: Gets or sets the size of the spinner. Default is `SpinnerSize.Medium`.
FluentProgressRing.Style: Gets or sets the in-line styles. If given, these will be included in the style attribute of the component.
FluentProgressRing.Tooltip: Gets or sets the tooltip text (supports HTML tags).This parameter requires the presence of a 'FluentTooltipProvider' in your main/layout page. _This parameter cannot be updated after the component has been rendered._
FluentProgressRing.Visible: Gets or sets the visibility of the component.If `true` (default), the component is visible.If `false`, the component is hidden.If `null`, the component is hidden and not rendered.

AddTag.__summary__: Internal component to conditionally render a tag and its content.

AddTag.ContentWhen: Gets or sets the condition to add the `Utilities.AddTag.ChildContent`.
AddTag.Name: Gets or sets the name of the tag.
AddTag.TagWhen: Gets or sets the condition to add the tag `Utilities.AddTag.Name`.

CssBuilder.__summary__: Represents a builder for creating CSS classes used in a component.

CssBuilder.AddClass(String, Boolean): Adds one or more CSS Classes to the builder with space separator, based on a condition.
CssBuilder.AddClass(String, Func`1): Adds one or more CSS Classes to the builder with space separator, based on a condition.
CssBuilder.Build(): Finalize the completed CSS Classes as a string.
CssBuilder.MinifyCss(String): Minifies the provided CSS content by removing comments, whitespace, and unnecessary semicolons.
CssBuilder.ValidateClassNames: Validate CSS class, which must respect the following regex: "^-?[_a-zA-Z]+[_a-zA-Z0-9-]*$".Default is true.

Debounce.__summary__: The DebounceTask dispatcher delays the invocation of an action until a predetermined interval has elapsed since the last call.This ensures that the action is only invoked once after the calls have stopped for the specified duration. Example: `Debounce Debounce = new Debounce();private async Task OnTextInput(ChangeEventArgs e){ await Debounce.RunAsync(400, async ct => { InputValue = e.Value?.ToString() ?? string.Empty; // Long processing task // ... if (ct.IsCancellationRequested) { // ... } }); // The action has been completed successfully if (Debounce.IsCompleted) { // ... }}`
Debounce.IsCompleted: Gets a value indicating whether the action has been completed.
Debounce.RunAsync(Int32, Func`1, CancellationToke: Debounce the execution of asynchronous tasks.Ensures that a function is invoked only once within a specified interval, even if multiple invocations are requested. _This implementation will swallow any exceptions that is thrown by the invoked task._
Debounce.RunAsync(Int32, Func`2, CancellationToke: Debounce the execution of asynchronous tasks.Ensures that a function is invoked only once within a specified interval, even if multiple invocations are requested. _This implementation will swallow any exceptions that is thrown by the invoked task._

InlineStyleBuilder.AddStyle(String, String, String, Boolean: Adds a conditional in-line style to the builder with space separator and closing semicolon..

InlineStyleBuilder.Build(Boolean): Finalize the completed Style as a string.
InlineStyleBuilder.BuildMarkupString(): Finalize the completed Style as a string.

RangeOf`1.IsValid(): Gets whether the range is valid: `Utilities.RangeOf.Start` and `Utilities.RangeOf.End` are not null and are not identical.

StyleBuilder.AddStyle(String, String): Adds a conditional in-line style to the builder with space separator and closing semicolon..

EventCallbackSubscribable`1.__summary__: Represents an event that you may subscribe to. This differs from normal C# events in that the handlersare EventCallback<typeparamref name="T" />, and so may have async behaviors and cause component re-renderingwhile retaining error flow.
EventCallbackSubscribable`1.InvokeCallbacksAsync(T): Invokes all the registered callbacks sequentially, in an undefined order.
EventCallbackSubscribable`1.Subscribe(EventCallbackSubscriber`1, Eve: Don't call this directly - it gets called by EventCallbackSubscription
EventCallbackSubscribable`1.Unsubscribe(EventCallbackSubscriber`1): Don't call this directly - it gets called by EventCallbackSubscription<param name="owner">The subscriber that owns this callback.</param>

EventCallbackSubscriber`1.__summary__: Represents a subscriber that may be subscribe to an `Infrastructure.EventCallbackSubscribable`.The subscription can move between `Infrastructure.EventCallbackSubscribable` instances over time,and automatically unsubscribes from earlier `Infrastructure.EventCallbackSubscribable` instanceswhenever it moves to a new one.
EventCallbackSubscriber`1.SubscribeOrMove(EventCallbackSubscribabl: Creates a subscription on the <paramref name="subscribable" />, or moves any existing subscription to itby first unsubscribing from the previous `Infrastructure.EventCallbackSubscribable`.            If the supplied <paramref name="subscribable" /> is null, no new subscription will be created, but anyexisting one will still be unsubscribed.

FluentMessageBox.Icon: Gets or sets the icon of the message box.
